biotools.summary: CT-ORG is a dataset for multiple organ segmentation in computed tomography. Morphological image segmentation scripts for CT scans. All scripts take an image, an optional vector of units, and possibly a mask of voxels to ignore. All scripts can be run with just the image, although the accuracy may be degraded.

bioschemas.name: CT-ORG
